reference_a:
@article{reeves2020,
  title = {An examination of idiographic networks of posttraumatic stress disorder symptoms},
  author = {Reeves, Jonathan W. and Fisher, Aaron J.},
  date = {2020},
  journaltitle = {Journal of Traumatic Stress},
  volume = {33},
  number = {1},
  pages = {84--95},
  issn = {1573-6598},
  doi = {10.1002/jts.22491}
}

features.name: beep
features.coding: NA

features.name: felt_enthusiastic
features.coding:
Felt enthusiastic
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: hypervigilant
features.coding:
Felt extremely alert, watchful, or on guard
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: aggressive
features.coding:
Felt irritable, had angry outbursts, or acted aggressively
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: afraid
features.coding:
Felt afraid
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: neg_thoughts_self
features.coding:
Had strong negative thoughts about yourself
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: avoidance
features.coding:
Avoided thoughts and/or feelings related to the traumatic event
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: reliving
features.coding:
Felt like you were reliving the traumatic event
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: unpleasant_dreams
features.coding:
Had unpleasant dreams about the trauamtic event
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: intrusions
features.coding:
Had stressful, unwanted memories of the traumatic event
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: sleep_duration
features.coding: Total sleep time from previous night in hours

features.name: restless_sleep
features.coding:
Experienced restless or unsatisfying sleep
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: sleep_troubles
features.coding:
Had trouble falling or staying asleep
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: horrified
features.coding:
Felt horrified
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: angry
features.coding:
Felt angry
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: ashamed
features.coding:
Felt ashamed
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: neg_thoughts_others
features.coding:
Had strong negative thoughts about others
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: neg_thoughts_world
features.coding:
Had strong negative thoughts about the world
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: self_blame
features.coding:
Blamed yourself for the traumatic event or its consequences
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: others_blame
features.coding:
Blamed others for the traumatic event or its consequences
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: avoid_places
features.coding:
Avoided places related to the traumatic event
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: upset
features.coding:
Felt upset when reminded of the traumatic event
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: physical_reactions
features.coding:
Had physical reactions when reminded of the traumatic event
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: amnesia
features.coding:
Had difficulty remembering the details of the traumatic event
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: anhedonia
features.coding:
Felt less interested or participated less in your usual activities
0 = not at all
100 = as much as possible

features.name: distant
features.coding:

100 = as much as possible

100 = as much as possible

100 = as much as possible
